channel.title: 508 espeon server how to make myself admin?
channel.description: i did character rights and put it to 2 and that didnt do anything but reset my account. then i went into rs2loginprotocol and did that and i still dont have a crown now is there an way else of doing this/??

item.title: 508 espeon server how to make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @str_by_zammy str by zammy
item.description:
@str_by_zammy wrote:

Don’t make multiple topics about the same question,

Rs2loginprotocal.java?

If you haven’t already, add:

if (p.username.equals("dizzo21")) { p.rights = 2; }

Thats all i have to say - Usernames must be entered in lowercase.
Figure it out - I had to.

Read full topic
item.source: 508 espeon server how to make myself admin?
